name: Pong wars (folhaslol)
description:
A long time ago... in a very distant place. There was no Peace. There was only war. Violence and conflict... But people were tired of all this. They needed another way of resolving this. They decided... no more war. Only Pong. Pong Wars.

Art and music by Plalo (@plalo2_) / Programming by Folhas (@sr_folhas)

(The game only works on windows)

(Controls: Z, up and down)
